p: For the COX-2 assay, the numbers of cells that are viable were determined by the Hoechst staining of the nucleic acids as previously described. The Opuntia extracts had mild cytotoxic effects on the RAW 264.7 cells, and which occurred mainly at a concentration of 100 Î¼M ( Fig 8). The results also showed that the activity of Opuntia extracts was not as a result of a reduction in cell viability.
